poem:
### A Grasp at Stardom

An eager leap  
amidst the flash—  
a moment's rush,  
chaos captured.  
Grande's grace  
untouched, cradled  
by the swift  
shield of friendship,  
like petals  
from the bough  
of a cherry tree—  
scattered dreams  
beyond reach,  
yet lingering  
in the dazzled  
air.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Man who grabbed Ariana Grande at Wicked sequel premiere charged A court in Singapore has charged a man who grabbed Ariana Grande at a premiere of Wicked: For Good on Thursday night with being a public nuisance. Video footage shows Johnson Wen jumping over a barricade at Universal Studios Singapore and rushing at Grande on the red carpet. Grande’s co-star Cynthia Erivo immediately jumped in to help protect her and Wen was moved away. Local". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Man who grabbed Ariana Grande at Wicked sequel premiere charged A court in Singapore has charged a man who grabbed Ariana Grande at a premiere of Wicked: For Good on Thursday night with being a public nuisance. Video footage shows Johnson Wen jumping over a barricade at Universal Studios Singapore and rushing at Grande on the red carpet. Grande’s co-star Cynthia Erivo immediately jumped in to help protect her and Wen was moved away. Local
